item.title: My First Post
item.description: Time to start Hi there! I’ve made a decision to switch my career from a support engineer on Windows to a DevOps engineer. However, I have a lot to learn before that, Linux and network basics to name few. I start this blog to kick myself learning harder by explaining things. Or as solutions storage. Time will show.
